title: Big Plays Spotlight: ackerman’s calculated juke

Best NA. http://tinyurl.com/mikasa-ackerman
His TP was already up...

Lol, his tp came up at the very start of that Gif (the shortened video clip above, not sure if it is really a gif, sry). click the video to see the genius of the tp. it saved him and he used it as soon as he could get into a good position to be safe (using the word loosely) from Elise.
Lol the plays
oh hi there
C'mon Rito step your game up, it's Vasilii not Vasillii.

Am I missing something? How is this a "Big Play"?? GJ shy didn't have enough damage to take him out before TP was up lol. This isn't a "Big Play" this is a fail on Elise's part as 1 more step forward before casting cocoon and dead Lee Sin. CD management? seriously? TP was up nearly from the start of the chase. I also saw ZERO jukes, as jumping to a ward or minion is not a "juke" unless you fool them, they where never fooled they knew exactly where he was and where he was going the entire time. The "Big Play" would have been lee waiting at golems until shy and/or Elise came around the corner then dashing to a ward on the opposite side THAT would have been a JUKE.

C'mon RIOT there are WAY better plays than this to feature!
You try it and see if you can even THINK about tp when you have two pros chasing you through their jungle.

Umm first off, anyone above silver should be thinking about things like teleport to get out at all times anyway. Second, idk where you get the "two pros chasing you" part since yazuki isn't anything special, certainly not pro, and kez is argueably the worst jungle in the challenger series.
I love it when Gold players think they can talk about how bad a Challenger player is.
But he isn't gold he's bronze two.

I love how you guys are complete idiots, you don't have to be a professional movie critic to call a movie bad. Same as you don't have to be a challenger player to call a challenger player bad. Saintvicious is bad and gets outsmited by everyone. Am I better than him? No, but he is trash compared to every other professional jungler.
Saint gets "outsmited" by everyone, guess someone didnt see saint smite steal baron in the All Stars Last year
Thats what I'm saying…. Its a good thing I'm bronze. Now i can say that any challenger player is bad. Right?

It amuses me when scrubs like us call challenger players and pro players "bad."  

Do none of you realize how badly we suck?
Well hey at least some of us admit this, lol.
Yall are mean
where T1 skins lol
ya go ackerman

I read that as Jacker's ejaculation
don't even ask how
Not particularly exciting. *yawns*

The only reason Lee survived was because the Elise decided to walk away as Lee went up. If Elise had continued to chase Lee wouldn't have been able to escape, since Elise would've been in range for a cocoon. Kinda sad when the "Big Play" was due to the enemy being dumb, not so much the Pro Play being skillful.
